IBM Storage Fusion v2.8.2¤

Install Modes¤

Mode Supported
OwnNamespace True
SingleNamespace True
MultiNamespace False
AllNamespaces False

  • isf-serviceability-operator-controller-manager
  • isf-ui-operator-controller-manager
